SELECT bsp.id , IFNULL(bsp.product_name,'') AS productName , image FROM dj_basics_storefront_product bsp INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods bg ON bsp.goods_id = bg.id where bsp.data_status=0 and ( bsp.detail_image is null or bsp.image is null or bsp.product_name is null or bsp.sell_price is null or bsp.supplied_num is null )
and ( bg.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') or bsp.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') )
